summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY AT VARIOUS SPEEDS FOR AN EXTENDED PERIOD OF TIME WITH BRAKES DEPRESSED, THE STEERING WHEEL VIOLENTLY SHOOK.  THE VEHICLE WAS INSPECTED BY A DEALER WHO TURNED THE BRAKE ROTORS.  AFTERWARDS, THE PROBLEM PERSISTED.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN BACK TO THE DEALER WHO AS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED.
